feed.title: LEAP: Little Electronic and Arduino Projects
feed.subtitle: my collection of electronics projects, many involving an Arduino in one way or another

entry.title: #676 LED-LDR Ring Oscillator
entry.summary: Building a simple ring oscillator using a light dependent resistor to couple the LED stages. From a circuit published in Elektor 2012/07.

entry.title: #675 LDR Data Slicer Trigger
entry.summary: Using a data slicer to extract a clean trigger signal from a light dependent resistor (LDR)

entry.title: #674 LDR Differential Comparator
entry.summary: Using a differential amplifier to extract a clean trigger signal from a light dependent resistor (LDR)

entry.title: #673 Empire in Decay - Victor III
entry.summary: A Soviet Victor III tied up to a wharf and left to decay in the toxic sludge ... modelled from the Dragon 1:700 kit (no electronics in this one)

entry.summary: Building the Trumpeter 1:144 kit of the Chengdu J-20 fifth-generation fighter of the PLAAF (no electronics here, just a great little kit)

entry.summary: Building a SG$5 bargain ARII 1:72 kit of the Mitsubishi Ki-46-II Dinah Trainer (no electronics)

entry.summary: Testing and reverse engineering a cheap Arduino Nano Expansion board, also pondering why GVS instead of GSV or GVSG.
